Description.Text:
Property Location
In the heart of Ahmedabad, Holiday Inn Express Ahmedabad is close to Sardar Patel Stadium and Hathi Singh Temple. This hotel is within close proximity of Gandhi Ashram and Manek Chowk.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 173 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and iPod docking stations. 32-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a 24-hour fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch, dinner, and brunch. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and a computer station. Planning an event in Ahmedabad? This hotel has 861 square feet (80 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch, dinner, and brunch. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

In the heart of Ahmedabad, Holiday Inn Express Ahmedabad is close to Sardar Patel Stadium and Hathi Singh Temple. This hotel is within close proximity of Gandhi Ashram and Manek Chowk.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sardar Patel Stadium - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Hathi Singh Temple - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Gandhi Ashram - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Manek Chowk - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Swaminarayan Temple - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Jama Masjid Mosque - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Gujarat University - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Sanskar Kendra Museum - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Sidi Bashir Mosque and the Shaking Minarets - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Naginawadi - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Gulmohar Park Mall - 6.4 km / 4 mi
ISCON Mall - 6.8 km / 4.3 mi
Adalaj Vav - 13.7 km / 8.5 mi
Swaminarayan Complex - 23.2 km / 14.4 mi
Lothal - 67 km / 41.6 mi

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Express Ahmedabad is Ahmedabad (AMD-Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Intl.) - 6 km / 3.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
